column6: CLASS DESCRIPTIONS: A: Off-lot water supply AND sewage disposal. B: Off-lot water supply OR sewage disposal. C: On-lot water supply AND sewage disposal.
column14: The designated Shore Land Area includes all lands within 250 feet of lakes and ponds greater than 10 acres in size.
